title: Bayesian Learning-Based OFDM CFO Estimation and Channel Estimation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Digital Communication Concepts and Fundamental Mathematics (Linear Algebra, Probability Theory) Knowledge
context.additional_context: Need to provide content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, emphasizing conceptual understanding and practical application examples over complex mathematical expressions.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles of Bayesian learning-based CFO estimation algorithms.
Learners can quantitatively analyze the impact of CFO errors on performance in OFDM systems.
Learners can simulate channel estimation procedures using EM-based Bayesian estimation techniques.
Learners can explain methods to achieve optimal estimation performance within the CFO estimation range (±0.5).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
